text: addeham parannu: enre raksitave, enikk oru atayalam erpetuttittarename. allahu parannu: ninakkulla atayalam angyarupattilallate munnu divasam ni manusyareat sansarikkatirikkalakunnu. ninre raksitavine ni dharalam ormikkukayum, vaikunneravum ravileyum avanre parisud'dhiye ni prakirttikkukayum ceyyuka
